title: How to Make a Car in Little Alchemy: Easy Walkthrough

steps.title: Combine Wheel + Metal to create Car.
steps.content: Combine Wheel + Metal to create Car. You'll need to combine a few of the base elements beforehand. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Car: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Fire + Stone = Metal Human + Metal = Tool Stone + Air = Sand Fire + Sand = Glass Sand + Glass = Time Plant + Time = Tree Tool + Tree = Wood Tool + Wood = Wheel Wheel + Metal = Car

steps.title: Combine Wheel + Metal to create Car.
steps.content: Combine Wheel + Metal to create Car. Before you can create Car, you'll need to unlock Time beforehand by discovering at least 100 elements. Here's the fastest way to create Car: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Stone = Tool Tool + Water = Wheel Stone + Fire = Metal Wheel + Metal = Car Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Stone = Tool Tool + Water = Wheel Stone + Fire = Metal Wheel + Metal = Car

steps.title: Car recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2.
steps.content: Car recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Be sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 1 : Car + Hospital or Doctor = Ambulance Car + Car = Bus Car + Electricity = Electric Car Car + Fireman = Firetruck Car + Ice Cream = Ice Cream Truck Car + House = RV Car + Snow = Snowmobile Car + Armor or Gun = Tank Car + Farmer or Field = Tractor Little Alchemy 2 : Car + Bird = Airplane Car + Hospital or Doctor = Ambulance Car + Car or Train or City or Big = Bus Car + Mountain or Mountain range = Cable car Car + Electricity or Wind turbine or Solar cell = Electric car Car + Shovel = Excavator Car + Firefighter or Fire or Fire extinguisher = Firetruck Car + House or Container or Wall or Barn = Garage Car + Ice Cream = Ice Cream Truck Car + Letter or Mailman or Post office = Mail truck Car + Moon = Moon rover Car + Atmosphere = Rocket Car + Park = Roller coaster Car + House = RV Car + Snow or Glacier or Ice = Snowmobile Car + Space = Spaceship Car + Armor or Gun or Metal or Steel = Tank Car + Farmer or Field or Cow = Tractor
